title: Mr Europe and the common market
subject_group: Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Marketing channels
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Europe - Economic conditions
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/International cooperation
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/European Economic Community
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/International trade
description: Summarises the economic changes in Western Europe today. Shows the costly difficulties encountered by a truckload of goods from Manchester, England, before it arrives at its destination in Italy. Shows how the common market breaks down barriers, and benefits participating countries. Interviews Jean Monnet, "Mr Europe" and other businessmen involved in the common market.
